name: @firebolt-js/schemas
description: Firebolt schemas for configuration and global types

scripts.validate: firebolt-openrpc --task validate --source src && npm run generate && firebolt-openrpc --task validate --source build/firebolt-specification.json --shared-schemas src/schemas/specifications
scripts.generate: firebolt-openrpc --task specification -b src/json/firebolt-specification-base.json --sdk core --sdk discovery --sdk manage -o build/firebolt-specification.json
